Project Name: Women Against Violence Against Women (WAVAW) Collection
Subject: Founding Documents (WAVAW)|~|Pornography--California--Los Angeles|~|Snuff films--California--Los Angeles
Name.correspondent: Los Angeles Feminist Women’s Health Center|~|Snyder, Arthur K.
Title: Letter protesting the release of "Snuff" in Los Angeles
Description.note: Document is signed by:Los Angeles Feminist Women's Health Center, Orange County Feminist Women's Health Center, Lesbian Tide, Olivia records, California Now Inc., Feminist Lawyers, Califia Community Collective, Hollywood-Silverlake Consciousness Raising Group, Guild of Feminist Authors, Radical Feminist Therapy Collective, Sisterhood Bookstore
Description.caption: "March 15, 1976Councilman Arthur K. SnyderFourteenth DistrictL.A. City Hall200 North Spring StreetLos Angeles, CA 90012Dear Councilman Snyder:If you are not already aware of the “Snuff” film coming to Los Angeles this week, we wish to bring this to your attention. It will be opening in twenty theaters throughout Los Angeles this Wednesday, March 17, unless people in the community take action to prevent that from happening.This film capitalizes on the murder and dismemberment of a woman. We deplore the violence and utter disrespect for human life epitomized in “Snuff”. Studies have shown that movies like this encourage and foster similar behavior and acts of atrocities in reality.The fact that a movie of the rank caliber of “Snuff” should be shown for popular viewing in our midst is deeply disturbing. We urge you to take every avenue of action open to you to halt the showing of this movie.If your office does not take positive action in this matter, we can only conclude that you condone the showing of this film."

Subject: Founding Documents (WAVAW)|~|Pornography--California--Los Angeles|~|Snuff films--California--Los Angeles
Name.correspondent: Los Angeles Feminist Women’s Health Center|~|Snyder, Arthur K.|~|Pines, Burt
Rights.permissionNote: Rights.statementLocal: Need to obtain permission to publish from original author.
Title: Councilman response to letter protesting the release of "Snuff" in Los Angeles
Description.caption: "March 19, 1976Mr. Burt PinesCity AttorneyRoom 1800City Hall EastDear Mr. Pines:I received the attached letter regarding the movie “Snuff.” I was astonished to hear of the violence and utter disrespect for the human life in this movie.I would like you to investigate this matter and reply directly to my office.Thank you for your cooperation.Very sincerely yours,ARTHUR K. SNYDERCouncilman, 14th District"
